Browse the source code of netbsd/external/gpl3/gcc/dist/libgcc/soft-fp/extendxftf2.c

30#include "soft-fp.h"
31#include "extended.h"
32#include "quad.h"
33
34TFtype
35__extendxftf2 (XFtype a)
36{
37 FP_DECL_EX;
38 FP_DECL_E (A);
39 FP_DECL_Q (R);
40 TFtype r;
41
42 FP_INIT_TRAPPING_EXCEPTIONS;
43 FP_UNPACK_RAW_E (A, a);
44#if (2 * _FP_W_TYPE_SIZE) < _FP_FRACBITS_Q
45 FP_EXTEND (Q, E, 4, 4, R, A);
46#else
47 FP_EXTEND (Q, E, 2, 2, R, A);
48#endif
49 FP_PACK_RAW_Q (r, R);
50 FP_HANDLE_EXCEPTIONS;
51
52 return r;
53}
54
